title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: UN DID NOT call Duterte 'world's best president'
subtitle: This story is fake. Don't believe it.
author: verafiles.org
vclaim:
No, the United Nations has not declared President Rodrigo Duterte the world's "best president."

Facebook page DU30 Solid Supporters published Aug. 28 a fabricated post claiming that the UN Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC) hailed the Philippine leader in an annual review published August 2016.

The post also featured a screen grab of the CNN International show Anderson Cooper 360 with the obviously photoshopped headline, "Duterte, the best president in the universe".

No news report, nor any of the documents published after UN ECOSOC's annual meeting in 2016, echoed DU30 Solid Supporter's claim.

In fact, the UN has expressed concern over Duterte's "apparent endorsement of extrajudicial killings" in his war on drugs but Duterte has dismissed criticism from the international body, telling a human rights expert earlier this year to "go to hell."
